Reviews.Title: Small performance from a small camera,
Reviews.Author: James Asaro
Reviews.Content: Did not work properly, and had to return it to the manufacturer.  This was a gift, and I had to pay shippingback from the person I gave it to, and also back to the manufacturer... Not Happy!

ProductInfo.Features:
Mini-size and light weight, ultraportable.
Built-in Wifi, freely connecting with wifi-enabled devices.Easy to use, with no complicated operating steps.
Remote camera viewing through WLAN 802.11 b/g/n. Remote audio & video recording through PC.
Video snapshot. Support LPEG & MJPEG recording.
SSID and password setting for privacy protection. Powered by battery (CR2) or charging cradle stand.
ProductInfo.Name: Ai-ball World's Smallest Ultraportable Wifi Mini Surveillance Camera IP Cam Wireless + Cradle Bracket for Ai-Ball Mini Wifi Surveillance Camera
